abstract.shortdesc: Replacing a VSA node allows you to add additional capacity.

body.note: You have to add a VSA node before removing the failed VSA node

section.title: Replace a VSA Node
section.p:
Perform the following steps to replace the failed VSA node:
Add the replacement VSA node. Refer to Adding a VSA Node for detailed procedure.
Remove the failed VSA node. Refer to Removing VSA Node for detailed procedure.
